---
title: "Explore Honig et al. data"
author: "Ven Popov"
---

```{r setup, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(targets)
```

This is what the data looks like:

```{r}
tar_load("honig_data")
head(honig_data)
```

Number of observations per subject and session:

```{r}
honig_data |> 
  group_by(subject, session) |> 
  summarise(n = n(),
  b = 1) |> 
  pivot_wider(names_from = session, values_from = n)
```

note that sessions 1 and 4 use uniformly distributed stimuli, while sessions 2 and 3 use normally distributed stimuli.

Response error by subject

```{r}
ggplot(honig_data, aes(resperr)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(~subject) +
  theme_classic()
```
